ttp_template:
<group name="apply_image_image_location_image_name_schedule_time">
system upgrade apply-image {{APPLY_IMAGE}} scheduled-time {{SCHEDULE_TIME | ORPHRASE}}
 location {{IMAGE_LOCATION | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
system upgrade apply-image Cisco_NFVIS-4.9.1-FC3.iso scheduled-time 0
system upgrade image-name Cisco_NFVIS-4.9.1-FC3.iso
 location /data/intdatastore/uploads/Cisco_NFVIS-4.9.1-FC3.iso
!
